hints.content:
Let's use the chart to create a graph and see which option matches our graph.

[[☃ image 1]]


Apple Type| Number of apples | Number of [[☃ image 2]] 
:- | :-: | :-:
Rome | $8$ | ${8}\div\blueD2=4$ pictures
Pink Lady | $9$ | ${9}\div\blueD2=$ between $4$ and $5$ pictures
Fiji | $10$ | ${10}\div\blueD2=5$ pictures
Gala | $4$ | ${4}\div\blueD2=2$ pictures
Granny Smith | $7$ | ${7}\div\blueD2=$ between $3$ and $4$ pictures

options.alt: A picture of an apple equals 2 apples. !

hints.content:
The following picture graph matches the chart:



[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A picture graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Number of apples and the vertical axis labeled Apple type. Each Apple type is listed along the vertical axis from bottom to top as follows: Granny Smith, Gala, Fiji, Pink Lady, and Rome. The number of apples for each apple type is represented by the number of pictures of apples plotted on the graph. Granny Smith is represented by 3 and a half pictures of apples, Gala is represented by 2 pictures of apples, Fiji is represented by 5 pictures of apples, Pink Lady is represented by 4 and a half pictures of apples, and Rome is represented by 4 pictures of apples. !

question.content:
An apple orchard grows many types of apples. Below is a table to show how many apples were picked on Saturday.

Apple Type |  Number of apples
:- | :-: | :-:
Rome | $8$
Pink Lady | $9$
Fiji | $10$
Gala | $4$
Granny Smith | $7$


[[☃ image 1]]

**Which picture graph correctly graphs the information in the table?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

options.alt: A picture of an apple equals 2 apples. !

choices.content: ![A picture graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Number of apples and the vertical axis labeled Apple type. Each Apple type is listed along the vertical axis from bottom to top as follows: Granny Smith, Gala, Fiji, Pink Lady, and Rome. The number of apples for each apple type is represented by the number of pictures of apples plotted on the graph. Granny Smith is represented by 3 and a half pictures of apples, Gala is represented by 2 pictures of apples, Fiji is represented by 5 pictures of apples, Pink Lady is represented by 4 and a half pictures of apples, and Rome is represented by 4 pictures of apples.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/42158926015a8f038645cd986031339b8d4af473)

Granny Smith is represented by 7 pictures of apples, Gala is represented by 4 pictures of apples, Fiji is represented by 10 pictures of apples, Pink Lady is represented by 9 pictures of apples, and Rome is represented by 8 pictures of apples.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/36ca05f4ae81644a228fe5ad3a634894a0c87508)
